sense.def:
Z besedo
certainly
poudarimo tisto, kar govorimo.

seg.quote: If nothing is done there will certainly be an economic crisis.
It certainly looks wonderful, doesn't it?

sense.def:
Besedo
certainly
uporabljamo tudi takrat, ko se strinjamo z nečim, kar je nekdo prej rekel ali predlagal.

seg.quote: ‘Would you agree that it is still a difficult world for women to live in?’—‘Oh certainly.’

sense.def:
Certainly not
rečemo takrat, ko hočemo močno poudariti nikalnico
no
.
